content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case that took place in antwerp the case involved a married couple who owned a joint family home the husband claimed that the work done by his father on the property should be considered a gift entitling him to compensation however the court ruled that the work done by the father does not qualify as a gift under the law the text also mentions the divorce proceedings and the appointment of a notaryliquidator to handle the division of assets the husband argued that the fathers free services had a significant impact on their assets and should be considered a gift the court disagreed and denied his claim for compensation the text also mentions a nonprofit organization that purchased a kitchen installation and the wifes claim for compensation due to a late reply from her husband the court determined that the husbands reply was delayed and found that the wife failed to provide sufficient evidence for her claim the court dismissed the appeal and affirmed the judgment
